posts.post_content:
FS: SOLD T206 Sovereign Backs. Cards are all raw. 4 were graded, Nicholls Hands on Knees PSA 3, Wilhelm SGC 30 ( that white spot above his cap is not a pin hole, just fleck missing ink) Lake SGC 40 ( 4 sharp corners, nice centering, light crease by hand tech grade) Gilbert part name on top (Gilbert was graded as well, a PSA 3 can't find flip) Kruger has part name on top, Donovan has small pin hole in green top left, see scan for rest of cards... Looking for SOLD on lot. Shipped, delivery confirmation and insurance.. Perfer paypal no fee, check, money order.... Thanks Ralph
